stateDiagram

%% Initial state name as "." so that it fits in black circle shape.
%% See https://github.com/StateSmith/StateSmith/issues/404
state "." as ROOT.(InitialState)

IDLE

IDLE : IDLE

IDLE : enter / #123; this.actions.pauseAllAudio()#59; this.actions.resetAllAudio()#59; this.actions.uiIdle()#59; this.actions.hideLoadingAnimation()#59; this.actions.initInputAdjustments()#59; this.actions.applyGridViewStyle()#59; #125;

READY

READY : READY

LOADING

LOADING : LOADING

PLAYING_DOTS

PLAYING_DOTS : PLAYING_DOTS

PLAYING_DOTS : enter / #123; this.actions.uiPlayingButtons()#59; this.actions.removeBlurr()#59; this.actions.greenDots()#59; this.actions.applyDotsViewStyle()#59; #125;

PLAYING_DOTS : CHAT_HISTORY_CLICKED / #123; this.actions.toggleTextVisibility()#59; #125;

PLAYING_DOTS : FROM_START_CLICKED / #123; this.actions.pauseAllAudio()#59; this.actions.resetAllAudio()#59; this.actions.setUpAndStartAllAudio()#59; #125;

PLAYING_GRID

PLAYING_GRID : enter / #123; this.actions.applyGridViewStyle()#59; #125;

PAUSED

LOADING_DOTS

LOADING_DOTS : LOADING_DOTS

LOADING_DOTS : enter / #123; this.actions.showLoadingAnimation()#59; this.actions.uiLoadingButtons()#59; this.actions.applyDotsViewStyle()#59; #125;

PLAYING_DOTS --> PLAYING_GRID : VIEW_TOGGLE_CLICKED / #123; this.actions.toggleView()#59; #125;

PLAYING_DOTS --> PLAYING_GRID : SPEECH_OVER / #123; this.actions.toggleView()#59; #125;

PLAYING_DOTS --> PAUSED : TOGGLE_PAUSE_RESUME / #123; this.actions.pauseAllAudio()#59; #125;

PLAYING_DOTS --> IDLE : MUSIC_OVER [this.actions.bothTracksEnded()]

PLAYING_DOTS --> IDLE : CANCEL / #123; this.actions.stopAndResetAllAudio()#59; #125;
